page.title: 10Trade In Hemyock.
page.content: The shops in Hemyock are:the Post Office which is at the top of Station Road and is owned by Mrs.Sanders,the Mace shop which is at the bottom of High Street and is owned by Mr.and Mrs.Hodgett,and a V.G. general store owned by Mr.and Mrs.Harrison in Station Road.We have two garages in Hemyock one on Culmstock Road owned by Mr.and Mrs.Moore who sell car parts, sweets,hire videos and more,and one in Station Road owned by Mr.Graham who sells petrol,bikes and bikeparts.The pub is called the Catherine Wheel and is owned by Mr.and Mrs.Root.The butchers shop is owned by Mr.and Mrs.Jackson.The hairdressers shop is owned by Mrs.Jones.The fish and chip shop is owned by Mrs.Longford.It has not been here long.In our area there are lots of different builders, carpenters and electritians.
